attributes.action: STOP using taxpayer pounds to subsidise excessive salaries to the bosses of UK rail companies
attributes.additional_details: If bosses can afford to pay themselves GBP1million per year they are charging too much for train fares OR are receiving too much in taxpayer funded subsidies from our so called government.  'Governance' would be our politicians taking the subsidies away as long as the bosses are paying themselves GBP1million.
